quotes.quote: The greatest happiness of life is the conviction that we are loved; loved for ourselves, or rather, loved in spite of ourselves.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.quote: Love looks not with the eyes, but with the mind, and therefore is winged Cupid painted blind.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: Love is a better teacher than duty.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Love is when the other person's happiness is more important than your own.
quotes.author: H. Jackson Brown Jr

quotes.quote: A man is already halfway in love with any woman who listens to him.
quotes.author: Brendan Francis

quotes.quote: People who are sensible about love are incapable of it.
quotes.author: Douglas Yates

quotes.quote: Love means never having to say you're sorry.
quotes.author: Erich Segal

quotes.quote: Love is like a friendship caught on fire. In the beginning a flame, very pretty, often hot and fierce, but still only light and flickering.
quotes.author: Amy Ruth Stahl

quotes.quote: A successful marriage requires falling in love many times, always with the same person.
quotes.author: Mignon McLaughlin

quotes.quote: Love is not finding someone to live with; it’s finding someone you can’t live without.
quotes.author: Rafael Ortiz
